page.title: 19THE LOCAL BUS SERVICE
page.content: The Midland Red daytime bus service {no. 737}runs from Nuneaton to Coventry and vice versa passing through the village of Arley. Generally, it is a weekly service but many buses do not run on Saturday. The earliest bus to leave Nuneaton station leaves at 6.10 a.m., goes to Old Arley then heads back to Nuneaton bus station at 7.12 a.m. The last bus leaves Coventry Pool Meadow at 7.18 p.m. and arrives at Nuneaton bus station at 8.15 p.m. The service that leaves Nuneaton bus station at 4 p.m. is also a school bus service for Etone school. The bus stops at Arley, Gun Hill, Old Arley, Ansley turn and Devitts Green. The service does not run on Sundays. The bus{no.743}service takes over in the evening.
